original_text:
then the flood would have swept us away,
    the torrent would have gone over us;
korean_text: 그 때에 물이 우리를 휩쓸며 시내가 우리 영혼을 삼켰을 것이며

sentences.original_text: then the flood would have swept us away
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 홍수가 우리를 휩쓸어 갔을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: the torrent would have gone over us
